title: 300x225xcreative-writing-class-online.jpg.pagespeed.ic.9MSxSv-xql.jpg
description:
Opportunities - Part 3
We suck at writing.  You probably agree.  So here is your chance to join the team.
We are looking for someone who can turn our thoughts and dreams into writing (blog posts/newsletters/G+ postings etc) that is interesting to everyone who uses budgie-desktop ... and those that we are trying to tempt - the post of "creative writer"
Interested?  Just drop a reply or contact +Polihron Alexandru or myself privately.
We would love to have you onboard :)
comments.comment:
Yeah this will be a so great opportunity to join our fastest growing budgie-remix OS. And in the future you'll be a Creative Writer in Official Ubuntu Budgie Flavor. So If you are enthusiastic about open-source and if you have creative writing abilities this opportunity is just for you..
So here we are budgie-remix team is inviting to you to join our great team :); Sounds interesting, would love to help you out with getting the word about Budgie across the globe :); +Nikola Stojić Thank you :) We're so glad to have you like Contributors for Budgie-Remix team. :)
I'll discuss with our Team and I'll get back to you as soon as possible.; +Udara Madubhashana Sure, if you need help with the website/management etc I can help too :P; +Nikola Stojić Okay :) Please accept my invitation on Hangouts and we'll continue it using hangouts :)
